nodes.bodyText: not sure how much convenience should be in the API, but if there is convenience, consider adding the default implementation of get(Partial)Document as well, to get rid of duplication.
seems to always be set to false

if this is actually useful/needed, please refactor into a separate class telling us if a specific field set is a superset of other field sets or not. How much faster is it to take a lock compared to looking up a set of strings in an immutable hash table?
